00057 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ParticleTrack {
00058 
00059 public:
00060 
00064     struct Vertex {
00065         EGS_Vector x;   
00066         EGS_Float e;    
00067 
00068         Vertex() : x(0,0,0), e(0) {};
00069         Vertex(EGS_Float px, EGS_Float py, EGS_Float pz) {
00070             x.x = px;
00071             x.y = py;
00072             x.z = pz;
00073             e = 1;
00074         };
00075         Vertex(EGS_Float px, EGS_Float py, EGS_Float pz, EGS_Float pe) {
00076             x.x = px;
00077             x.y = py;
00078             x.z = pz;
00079             e = pe;
00080         };
00081         Vertex(const EGS_Vector &px, EGS_Float pe) : x(px), e(pe) {};
00082     };
00083 
00085     struct ParticleInfo {
00086         EGS_I32 q;      
00087         ParticleInfo(EGS_I32 pq) {
00088             q = pq;
00089         };
00090         ~ParticleInfo() { };
00091     };
00092 
00094     EGS_ParticleTrack() : m_pInfo(NULL), m_size(16), m_nVertices(0) {
00095         m_track = new Vertex* [m_size];
00096     }
00097 
00099     ~EGS_ParticleTrack() {
00100         clearTrack();
00101         if (m_track) {
00102             delete [] m_track;
00103         }
00104         m_track = NULL;
00105     };
00106 
00112     void clearTrack();
00113 
00119     int writeTrack(ofstream *trsp);
00120 
00122     void addVertex(Vertex *x);
00123 
00129     Vertex *getVertex(int v);
00130 
00132     int getNumVertices() {
00133         return m_nVertices;
00134     };
00135 
00137     void setParticleInfo(ParticleInfo *p) {
00138         m_pInfo = p;
00139     };
00140 
00142     ParticleInfo *getParticleInfo() {
00143         return m_pInfo;
00144     };
00145 
00146 protected:
00147 
00149     void grow();
00150 
00151     ParticleInfo    *m_pInfo;       
00152 
00153     int             m_size;         
00154     int             m_nVertices;    
00155     Vertex          **m_track;      
00156 };
00157 
00168 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ParticleTrackContainer {
00169 
00170 public:
00171 
00173     EGS_ParticleTrackContainer() : m_nEvents(0), m_nTracks(0),
00174         m_totalTracks(0), m_stackMap(NULL), m_isScoring(NULL), m_bufferSize(0),
00175         m_buffer(NULL), m_trspFile(NULL) {};
00176 
00184     EGS_ParticleTrackContainer(const char *fname, int buf_size) : m_nEvents(0),
00185         m_nTracks(0), m_totalTracks(0), m_isScoring(NULL), m_bufferSize(0), m_buffer(0),
00186         m_trspFile(NULL) {
00187         m_bufferSize = buf_size;
00188 
00189         // initialize the arrays
00190         m_buffer = new EGS_ParticleTrack* [m_bufferSize];
00191         m_stackMap = new int [m_bufferSize];
00192         m_isScoring = new bool [m_bufferSize];
00193         for (int i = 0; i < m_bufferSize; ++i) {
00194             m_buffer[i] = new EGS_ParticleTrack();
00195             m_stackMap[i] = -1;
00196             m_isScoring[i] = false;
00197         }
00198 
00199         // open output file and write header
00200         m_trspFilename = string(fname);
00201         m_trspFile = new ofstream(m_trspFilename.c_str(), ios::binary);
00202         int dummy = 0;
00203         // at the end this will be replaced with the number of recorded tracks
00204         m_trspFile->write((char *)&dummy, sizeof(int));
00205     };
00206 
00208     ~EGS_ParticleTrackContainer() {
00209         // if any particles are left in memory -> flush them to the file
00210         if (m_nTracks > 0) {
00211             flushBuffer();
00212         }
00213 
00214         if (m_buffer) {
00215             for (int i = 0; i < m_bufferSize; i++) {
00216                 if (m_buffer[i]) {
00217                     delete m_buffer[i];
00218                 }
00219                 m_buffer[i] = NULL;
00220             }
00221             delete [] m_buffer;
00222             m_buffer = NULL;
00223         }
00224         if (m_stackMap) {
00225             delete [] m_stackMap;
00226         }
00227         if (m_isScoring) {
00228             delete [] m_isScoring;
00229         }
00230         if (m_trspFile) {
00231             delete m_trspFile;
00232         }
00233         m_trspFile = NULL;
00234     };
00235 
00237     void setEvents(int e) {
00238         m_nEvents = e;
00239     }
00240 
00242     int getEvents() {
00243         return m_nEvents;
00244     }
00245 
00247     int getCurrentNumVertices() {
00248         return (m_nTracks > 0) ? m_buffer[m_nTracks-1]->getNumVertices() : 0;
00249     };
00250 
00252     void addVertex(EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *x);
00253 
00260     void addVertex(int stackIndex, EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *x);
00261 
00265     EGS_ParticleTrack::Vertex *getTrackVertex(int tr, int v);
00266 
00268     bool isScoringParticle() {
00269         return m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1];
00270     }
00271 
00273     bool isScoringParticle(int stackIndex) {
00274         return m_isScoring[m_stackMap[stackIndex]];
00275     }
00276 
00278     void stopScoringParticle() {
00279         m_isScoring[m_nTracks-1] = false;
00280     }
00281 
00283     void stopScoringParticle(int stackIndex) {
00284         m_isScoring[m_stackMap[stackIndex]] = false;
00285         m_stackMap[stackIndex] = -1;
00286     }
00287 
00289     void startNewTrack();
00290 
00298     void startNewTrack(int stackIndex);
00299 
00301     void startNewTrack(EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *p);
00302 
00304     void setParticleInfo(int stackIndex, EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *p) {
00305         m_buffer[m_stackMap[stackIndex]]->setParticleInfo(p);
00306     }
00307 
00309     void setCurrentParticleInfo(EGS_ParticleTrack::ParticleInfo *p) {
00310         m_buffer[m_nTracks-1]->setParticleInfo(p);
00311     }
00312 
00314     int readDataFile(const char *filename);
00315 
00319     void reportResults(bool with_header = true);
00320 
00321 protected:
00322 
00329     void flushBuffer();
00330 
00335     void updateHeader();
00336 
00337     int                 m_nEvents;      
00338     int                 m_nTracks;      
00339     int                 m_totalTracks;  
00340 
00341     int                 *m_stackMap;    
00344     bool                *m_isScoring;   
00347     int                 m_bufferSize;   
00348     EGS_ParticleTrack   **m_buffer;     
00349     ofstream            *m_trspFile;    
00350     string              m_trspFilename; 
00351 };
